name: coleam00 Archon
notes: Primary dashboard + onboarding + MCP config copy flow.

name: SurrealDB MCP
notes: MCP server itself has no dashboard; Surrealist is the DB UI.

name: qdrant mcp-server-qdrant
notes: Dashboard comes from Qdrant backend, used by qdrant MCP instances.

name: ardaaltinors MemCP
notes: Feature-rich but lower reliability and heavier infra/auth complexity.

name: doobidoo mcp-memory-service
notes: Dashboard exists; MCP startup reliability was weaker in this environment.

name: arabold docs-mcp-server
notes: Web UI, plus MCP endpoints /mcp and /sse.

name: thedotmack claude-mem
notes: UI depends on claude-mem worker runtime; plugin-centric.

name: basicmachines basic-memory
notes: Selected MCP server is local-first; cloud UI is optional.

name: getzep graphiti
notes: Dashboard belongs to managed Zep platform; OSS Graphiti requires custom ops.

name: Significant-Gravitas AutoGPT
notes: Not a direct Codex MCP server; high ops overhead.

name: HKUDS AutoAgent
notes: Framework with UI, but not a direct MCP coding-context server.

name: SpillwaveSolutions agent-brain
notes: API docs UI available; primarily plugin/server workflow.

name: Docfork
notes: Cloud docs service, not local-first MCP runtime.
